title: Haunted Mansion Text Adventure (Test)
welcome_message: Welcome, foolish mortal, to the Haunted Mansion Text Adventure. This game has audio (activate by clicking the screen or typing 'sound on'). If you've never played a text adventure before, type 'help' for instructions.
quit_message: Thank you for testing the Haunted Mansion Text Adventure.
version_fallback: Haunted Mansion Text Adventure - JavaScript Version
